item.description:
Sucker PUnch is about a young girl is institutionalized by her wicked stepfather. Retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, she envisions a plan which will help her escape from the facility. This movie is directed by the same people who did Watchmen and 300. You can find more information about the movie here: http://suckerpunchmovie.warnerbros.com/  

We will be meeting at 3:45 for the 3:50 showing. I will update the event with the time details by Friday night at the latest.

If people want, we can grab a bite to eat together after the movie at one of the many area restaurants.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby; message me if you want my cell
item.name: Sucker Punch @ Showcase Cinemas, Seekonk
